page.title: 06SHOPPING
page.content: Bracknell was the most popular town to do shopping out of places like Reading, Wokingham and Bracknell. In Bracknell, Sainsburys was the most popular shop. Some people used Tescos in Wokingham. In Binfield there are 19 shops. Here are some of them: Sweetnews, VG, Corner shop, Mace and the Hardware shop, Betting shop and 3 Hairdressers. Most people go shopping on Saturdays and Thursdays. We interviewed one person and she said, "Sorry I am not English." Most people agreed that the Shopping Precinct in Binfield was easier for their daily goods when they had run out of something, but some people said that the Shopping Precinct was not easier for their daily goods. Out of the people we interviewed fourteen of them used Sainsburys, and nineteen of them went to Bracknell to shop.
